comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This photo appears on page 34 of Their Gilded Cage By Richard Jay Hutto, June Hall McCash, Stillman Rockefeller. Published by Indigo Custom Publishing, 2005 ISBN 0977091228, 9780977091225. books.google.com/books?id=FNPoVchaehwC Beatrice Claflin was the daughter of Arthur Brigham Claflin, a "textile magnate" ( to quote another source, books.google.com/books?id=Gka2twCr8SEC She married Robert P. Breese (in 1915), and later (in 1928) the Earl of Gosford.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: MM Van Beuren might be: "MICHAEL MURRAY VAN BEUREN was born March 31st, 1873, in New York City. He is a son of Frederick Theodore van Beuren and Elizabeth Potter, who were married Aug. 26th, 1869, at San Francisco, Cal., and had altogether five children, two boys and three girls. Frederick Theodore van Beuren, Jr., '98, is a brother. ... He was married Sept. 25th, 1895, at Tarrytown, N. Y., to Miss Mary L. Archbold, daughter of John D. Archbold of New York City, and has one child, a son, Archbold van Beuren (b. Dec. 21st, 1905, in New York City)." From page 701 of Decennial Record, class of 1896, Yale College. books.google.com/books?id=s4IDAAAAYAAJ
